I am developing a project with Netbeans. I am using spring and
hibernate in=
 the project.

I want to test my procejt but i get an error abbout classpat=
h. The
test looks for a file but can not find it. The file is
hibernate-map=
ping-3.0.dtd named file. It places in
myproject/build/classes directory. Bu=
t it searches th file in
/myproject   directory. While the test cannot find=
 the .dtd file, it
can find the other files which places in the same direct=
ory with .dtd
file.
The exact error:Caused by: org.dom4j.DocumentException:=

ot find the file specified) Nested exception:
